ProfileVariable.pvv:
The Door is
Loading

ProfileVariable.pvd: The HTML file you want to use for the locked text.
The HTML file you want to use for the unlocked text.
The HTML file you want to use for the loading text.
The HTML file you want to use if you only want 1 file instead of 3.

TextElement.Str:
Volume up - Lock
Volume down - Unlock

WebElement.Str:
The Door is
Loading

<html>
<head>
<style>
@font-face {
  font-family: 'CrushMine';
  src: url('file:///storage/emulated/0/Tasker/fonts/Crush%20Mine.otf');
}
html, body {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: black;
}
button {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 0;
  font-family: 'CrushMine', sans-serif;
  font-size: 36px;
  color: white;
  background: linear-gradient(145deg, #440000, #990000);
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 10px #ff0000, 0 0 25px #ff0000;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}
button:hover {
  background: #ff0000;
  color: black;
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 20px #ff0000, 0 0 40px #ff0000;
}
button:active {
  background: #880000;
  animation: pulseRed 0.5s ease;
}
@keyframes pulseRed {
  0% { box-shadow: inset 0 0 15px #ff0000, 0 0 25px #ff0000; }
  50% { box-shadow: inset 0 0 30px #ff0000, 0 0 70px #ff0000; }
  100% { box-shadow: inset 0 0 15px #ff0000, 0 0 25px #ff0000; }
}
</style>

<script>
function pressLock() {
  window.location.href = "lock";
}
</script>
</head>
<body>
<button id="lockBtn" onclick="pressLock()">Lock</button>
</body>
</html>

<html>
<head>
<style>
@font-face {
  font-family: 'CrushMine';
  src: url('file:///storage/emulated/0/Tasker/fonts/Crush%20Mine.otf');
}
html, body {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: black;
}
button {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 0;
  font-family: 'CrushMine', sans-serif;
  font-size: 36px;
  color: white;
  background: linear-gradient(145deg, #004400, #00aa00);
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 10px #00ff00, 0 0 25px #00ff00;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
}
button:hover {
  background: #00ff00;
  color: black;
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 20px #00ff00, 0 0 40px #00ff00;
}
button:active {
  background: #008800;
  animation: pulseGreen 0.5s ease;
}
@keyframes pulseGreen {
  0% { box-shadow: inset 0 0 15px #00ff00, 0 0 25px #00ff00; }
  50% { box-shadow: inset 0 0 30px #00ff00, 0 0 70px #00ff00; }
  100% { box-shadow: inset 0 0 15px #00ff00, 0 0 25px #00ff00; }
}
</style>

<script>
function pressUnlock() {
  window.location.href = "unlock";
}
</script>
</head>
<body>
<button id="unlockBtn" onclick="pressUnlock()">Unlock</button>
</body>
</html>
